isis.stitle: 9 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS INTERNATIONAL PS125-9A, PS140-9A, PSO125-9A, PSO140-9A AND PSO150-9A - REASSEMBLY - INTEGRAL LUBE PUMP

step1.para: Install the range countershaft shims and retainer plate ( Figure 127).

figure.caption: Figure 101. Install Range Countershaft Shims and Retainer Plate

caution.para: Make sure the shims are aligned with the plate holes to insure proper transmission operation.

step1.para: Place the oil bypass valve into the opening in the case oiling system ( Figure 128).

figure.caption: Figure 102. Place Oil Bypass Valve into Opening in Case Oiling System

step1.para: Install the oil plate mounting plate ( Figure 129). Tighten the bolts to 34 to 41 ft-lbs. (46 to 56 Nm).

figure.caption: Figure 103. Install Oil Plate Mounting Plate

step1.para: Check the main box countershaft end plate. End play must be between .003 and .008 inch ( Figure 130).

figure.caption: Figure 104. Check Main Box Countershaft End Play

step1.para: Install the countershaft reverse gear. This gear will only fit in one position because of the blind spline ( Figure 131). Secure the gear with a washer and bolt. Tighten to 78 to 98 ft-lbs. (106 to 133 Nm).
Insert the oil discharge tube into the opening at the top of the case. Align the guide pin with the hole in the case ( Figure 132).

figure.caption: Figure 106. Insert Oil Discharge Tube into Opening at Top of Case

step1.para: Install the oil pump assembly on the oil pump mounting plate ( Figure 133). Tighten the bolts to 34 to 41 ft-lbs. (46 to 56 Nm). Spin the oil pump gear to make sure it moves freely.

figure.caption: Figure 107. Install Oil Pump Assembly on Oil Pump Mounting Plate
